nodes.text: Bogan Boulevard, nicknamed "Broken Boulevard", was a road in the Gorsian settlement of Shaketown. Moonglow Polychemical's refinery was located on the street, as was Besalisk chef Drakka's eponymous diner. The bombing of the Imperial shuttle Truncheon during the Gorse conflict caused extensive damage to several properties on the street, including Drakka's Diner. Kanan Jarrus noted that the damage from the bombing made the street's nickname more descriptive than usual.
